2.0.0.name: react-debounce-input
2.0.0.description: React component that renders Input with debounced onChange

scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase origin/master --force-rebase && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --force && git checkout master
scripts.build: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:example -s" "npm run build:bower -s"
scripts.prepublish: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:bower -s" && node scripts/bower-version.js
scripts.test:cov: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report text --report html --dir reports/coverage --include "**/!(*-test).js" test
scripts.prepush: npm run test -s && npm run test:e2e -s

2.0.2.name: react-debounce-input
2.0.2.description: React component that renders Input with debounced onChange

scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase origin/master --force-rebase && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --force && git checkout master
scripts.build: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:example -s" "npm run build:dist -s"
scripts.prepublish: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:dist -s" && node scripts/bower-version.js
scripts.test:cov: node ./scripts/env.js test "babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report text --report html --dir reports/coverage test"

2.1.0.name: react-debounce-input

scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase origin/master --force-rebase && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --force && git checkout master
scripts.build: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:example -s" "npm run build:dist -s"

2.2.0.name: react-debounce-input
2.2.0.description: React component that renders Input with debounced onChange

scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase origin/master --force-rebase && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --force && git checkout master
scripts.build: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:ghPages -s" "npm run build:dist -s" "npm run build:min -s"
scripts.build:lib: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib --source-maps --ignore src/example
scripts.prepublish: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:dist -s" "npm run build:min -s"
scripts.test:cov: cross-env NODE_ENV=test babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report text --report html --report lcov --dir reports/coverage test
scripts.prepush: npm run test -s && npm run test:e2e -s

scripts.prepublish: parallelshell -w "npm run build:lib -s" "npm run build:dist -s" "npm run build:min -s"
scripts.test:cov: cross-env NODE_ENV=test babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report text --report html --report lcov --dir reports/coverage test

readme: # react-debounce-input [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/react-debounce-input.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-debounce-input) [![Gitter](https://img.shields.io/gitter/room/nkbt/help.svg?style=flat-square)](https://gitter.im/nkbt/help) [![CircleCI](https://img.shields.io/circleci/project/nkbt/react-debounce-input.svg?style=flat-square&label=nix-build)](https://circleci.com/gh/nkbt/react-debounce-input) [![Dependencies](https://img.shields.io/david/nkbt/react-debounce-input.svg?style=flat-square)](https://david-dm.org/nkbt/react-debounce-input) [![Dev Dependencies](https://img.shields.io/david/dev/nkbt/react-debounce-input.svg?style=flat-square)](https://david-dm.org/nkbt/react-debounce-input#info=devDependencies) React component that renders an Input, Textarea or other element with debounced onChange. Can be used as drop-in replacement for `` or `
